Comment: The neuron is identified as neurosecretory because it expresses neuropeptides and innervates a neurohemal organ (McCormick and Nichols
SP3 neuron.Definition: Larval neuro-secretory neuron whose cell body is located in the superior medial protocerebrum. There is one cell per brain hemisphere (McCormick and Nichols, 1993) and its axon innervates the corpus cardiacum (Wegener et al., 2011).
